name: Validate adding a book to cart and proceed to checkout
description:
As a user
  I want to browse and purchase a book
  So that I can buy this book and fill payment form

steps.name: Then Validate that user lands on website
Then User should see the book "Selenium Ruby" with price "500.00"
When User selects book "Selenium Ruby" upon clicking on "Add to basket"
Then User should see a success message indicating the book was added to the basket
When User clicks on the Shopping Cart icon
Then User should see "Selenium Ruby" in the cart with price "500.00"
When User clicks on the Proceed to Checkout button
Then User should see the Billing Details form
